summary: \"What we do in Life, Echoes in Eternity...\"
descriptionHtml:
TIRED OF THE USUAL, WIMPY, BORING, AND DOWNRIGHT PATHETIC SKYRIM FORCES?
                                                 NOT ANYMORE

                                                 INTRODUCING:
[IMG]http://i1270.photobucket.com/albums/jj607/thecrustydemon/FactionOverhaul.jpg[/IMG]

[IMG]http://i1270.photobucket.com/albums/jj607/thecrustydemon/2012-02-02_00049.jpg[/IMG]
                                                      IMPERIAL
[IMG]http://i1270.photobucket.com/albums/jj607/thecrustydemon/2012-02-06_00005.jpg[/IMG]
                                                      THALMOR
[IMG]http://i1270.photobucket.com/albums/jj607/thecrustydemon/2012-02-07_00038.jpg[/IMG]
                                                    STORMCLOAK

DESCRIPTION: 
-------------------
A MASSIVE Overhaul to alter the various forces of Skyrim, mainly the ruling factions. So far heres what i have to offer:

--IMPERIAL
[IMG]http://i1270.photobucket.com/albums/jj607/thecrustydemon/2012-02-02_00026.jpg[/IMG]

-Imperial Heavy is now Imperial Legate Armor
-Studded is now Legionnaire Armor
-Aquilifer Armor Added
-All capes replaced with better more efficient ones
-Imperial Legion Standard Added(NEW SHIELD)
-Penitus Oculatus RE- outfitted
-Added Unique Legion Armor \"Armor of The Northern General\" with Prometheus_ts\"s Amazing Winter Mesh
-Solitude Guard now inducted into the Imperial Legion aka armor replaced and given unique horsehair helmet
-Retexs EVERYWHERE
-\"Legend of the Northern General\" Book added to Castle Dour and Palace of the Kings
-Next to do is award new armor with each rank.


--STORMCLOAK
[IMG]http://i1270.photobucket.com/albums/jj607/thecrustydemon/2012-02-06_00010.jpg[/IMG]

-Retexures of Stormcloak Helms
-officer Helm replaced with Nordic styled Helmet
-JUST stormcloak Cuirass bulked up with bronze pauldrons
-TO-DO: same as with Legion, award rank with armor.


---THALMOR
[IMG]http://i1270.photobucket.com/albums/jj607/thecrustydemon/2012-02-06_00003.jpg[/IMG]

-Thalmor Robes reoutfitted with Inquisitional Elven Armored Robes.
-Hood now closed for a more intimidating look
-All Special Thalmor Characters now wear non-hooded robes

--OTHER

-Solitude Guard Changed
-All town watchs will soon be changed in some way as well.

BUGS AND OTHER SHIT
-------------------------------

There shouldnt be any but may conflict with any mods that alter any of town watchs or the warring factions.

[IMG]http://i1270.photobucket.com/albums/jj607/thecrustydemon/2012-02-04_00001.jpg[/IMG]

INSTALLATION
--------------------

DELETE ALL PREVIOUS VERSIONS OF THIS MOD!!!!!
DO IT NOW!!!!!
1. Alright, now simply extract data and esp to data.
2. you may choose the different textures for Tulius
3. you also have th choice of a caped or fur-caped Imperial heavy(Legate) Cuirass.
4.Enjoy.......


THINGS TO DO
---------------------

-add Faction based followers on demand
-award faction based armor upon rank
-somehow join the thalmor
-various others

[IMG]http://i1270.photobucket.com/albums/jj607/thecrustydemon/2012-02-02_00024.jpg[/IMG]


CREDITS
-----------

1. FIRST AND FOREMOST THANKS TO PROMETHEUS_TS FOR HIS AWESOME LEGION WINTER CUIRASS MESH!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

2.THANKS TO Citadel535 FOR HIS AWESOME CHAINMAIL TEXTURES

3. Thank you Ridley Scott for Gladiator.

4. AND YES UNFOURTUNETLY, the winterized Variant will be discontinued for the time being. 

[IMG]http://i1270.photobucket.com/albums/jj607/thecrustydemon/2012-02-02_00029.jpg[/IMG]

--TheCrustyDemon
author: TheCrustyDemon
